channel.title: Comments on: Titus Andronicus Somehow Surprised That The Pogues Are Dicks

item.title: By: Logan K. Young

item.description:
Check out "Spider" Stacy comments...and you thought MacGowan was unprofessional: http://www.crawdaddy.com/index.php/2011/03/10/live-show-review-the-pogues-at-930-club-washington-dc/?utm_source=twitterfeed&utm_medium=twitter
